Like many teachers in her city, Varduhi also gives paid private courses of Armenian Language and Literature, to prepare pupils for entrance examinations. She says she does this with great love and care towards her pupils.

Varduhi would like to spend this loan on the purchase of a computer and professional literature that she really needs for her pedagogical activities.

loans.use: to buy a computer and professional literature

loans.name: Emily

texts.es: Emily es una joven soltera sin hijos y vive con sus padres en la ciudad de La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde sus padres pagan un anticretico pero al menos la familia tiene luz, agua y alcantarillado Emily atiende un cafe internet donde tambien ofrece servicio de fotocopias y quiere un prestamo para comprar otra maquina fotocopiadora Emily es la unica  que tiene un trabajo fijo en el hogar pero la clienta goza de buena salud y su actividad es estable, por lo que espera su ayuda
texts.en:
Emily is a single young woman with no children. She lives with her parents in the city of La Paz in a home made of bricks and cement. The home is a rental, but at least the family has lights, running water, and a sewage system.

Emily runs an internet cafe where she also offers a photocopy service. She would like a loan in order to purchase another photocopy machine. Emily is the only person in her household who has a stable job, but she is in good health and her work is stable, and so she hopes for help.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopy machine.

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Lily, 27, is a smallholder dairy farmer based in Nandihills, Kenya. She has two children and has farmed for three years. Her primary source of income is selling milk. 

Lily requests a loan from Kiva via Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry. This venture will diversify her product portfolio and help her manage risks that may affect a single product line. The poultry business will enable her to sell eggs and other poultry products and increase her income. The money will help her  pay the high costs of supplies that have given her sleepless nights in the past. She loves farming and aspires  grow her business. 

She appreciates Juhudi Kilimo and its partners for being supportive to smallholder farmers and making affordable loans available. She plans to keep leveraging her business to grow her farm and improve her family's living standards. Lily is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Gagik

texts.en:
Gagik is 63 years old and  lives in the city of Kapan in the Syunik region. He is married and has three sons; two are married and  live separately with their families. Gagik’s wife works at the college as a secretary. Gagaik has a vocational education and has worked as a geologist for 30 years. 

He now drives his own taxi. As you can see from his photo, he does his work with pleasure and often meets his friends and relatives while working since he gives them his taxi services nearly every day.

Gagik needs a loan to  prepare for winter and  will buy and change his car's tires to drive safely no matter what the weather is like outside.

loans.use: to  buy and change his car's tires.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dairy products (cheese, cream, curd, etc.) at wholesale.

loans.name: Elia Hermenegilda

texts.es:
Elia  de 60 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora. se dedica al comercio y tiene un pequeño negocio en su casa, es venta de productos de primera necesidad, trabaja todos los días para no perder sus clientes.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar maíz, arroz, frijol, entre otros productos que demandan en la tienda. Esto le ayudara en gran parte ya que tendrá más productos y podrá vender mucho más.

 Su  sueño es que su hijo pueda salir adelante, para que en el futuro tenga su casa y pueda vivir en mejores condiciones
texts.en:
Elia, 60, is a very hard working woman. She is dedicated to trade and has a small shop in her house selling basic grocery products. She works every day so she does not lose customers.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy maize, rice and beans, among other products in demand in her shop. This will help her in a big way since she will have more products and be able to sell a lot more.

Her dream is that her son can get ahead so, in the future, he will have a house and be able to live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy maize, rice, beans, among other products that are in demand in her shop.

loans.name: Zoila De La Paz

texts.es: Zoila tiene 46 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee desde hace 10 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Zoila is 46 years old and lives in her own house with her family. For ten years, she has owned a small shop located in her home. She has a lot of customers due to her good prices and her friendliness when selling. She is requesting a loan to be able to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, drinks, candies, pastries, etc. and thus be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, drinks, candies, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Dúo Elizaneth Group

texts.es: Es integrada por las señora, María Elizabeth de 26 años de edad, unida y madre de 2 niños, Doña Elizabeth quien se dedica a la destaza y venta de pollo, de manera ambulante dos veces por semana los días martes y jueves, y también cuenta en su casa con una pequeña tienda donde logra ofrecer algunos artículos que son más buscados por la gente, como maíz, arroz, frijol azúcar, jugos, golosinas, gaseosas.en esta oportunida ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para la venta.
texts.en: The group is composed of María Elizabeth, who is 26 years old, married and mother to two children. Elizabeth is dedicated to the butchering and sale of chicken on foot, two times a week on Tuesdays and Thursdays. She also has small shop in her house where she manages to offer some items that are the most sought out by people such as maize, rice, beans, sugar, juices, candies, sodas. At this time, she is requesting this loan to buy consumable products to sell.

loans.use: to buy consumable products to sell.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a 36-year-old married lady with 3 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

She owns a salon which she runs twelve hours every day, and she has been in this business for seven years. She faces the challenge of customers coming seasonally, and this negatively limits her profits. 

In addition to the salon, she hopes to build a very good house for rental business. 

Grace needs a loan to buy chemicals and weaves for the salon as she awaits the Christmas peak season. She expects an increase in customer flow and hence in her income.

loans.use: to buy chemicals and weaves for the salon

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Christine has been operating a grocery stall selling vegetables for the past six years. She sells at the market to town-dwellers and neighbors. She faces the challenge of the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

With a loan of 15,000 KES she wants to purchase a stock of vegetables, onions and tomatoes for her business. 

She dreams of expanding and establishing a motorcycle transport business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of vegetables, onions and tomatoes for her business

loans.name: Marlon De Jesus

texts.es: Marlon de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el posee un taller de mecánica automotriz ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 10 años, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Marlon esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de una caja de herramientas, micas burros de motores, repuestos, etc. y a si poder para seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Marlon, 34 years old, lives in his own house with his wife. He has had an auto-mechanic shop located in his place of residence for ten years. He has a lot of customers due to his good work. With the money he obtains from his job, he manages to cover his home expenses. Marlon is requesting a loan to buy a toolbox, engine starters, spare parts, etc. and thus be able to continue with his work and  have better income.

loans.use: to buy a toolbox, engine starters, spare parts, etc.

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es: Marvin de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 24 años experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de vender una buena calidad de producto por esa razón posee clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de trasmallos, redes y darle mantenimiento a la lancha que muestra en la fotografía ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y de ingresos.
texts.en: Marvin, 37 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their three children. He has been dedicated to artisanal fishing for 24 years, an experience that has given him the opportunity to sell a good quality product. For that reason, he has established customers. He is requesting a loan to buy trammels, nets and to perform maintenance on the boat shown in the photo since it is the only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy trammels, nets and perform maintenance on the boat.

loans.name: Shirinmoh

texts.en:
Shirinmoh was born in 1995 and is a very hardworking and industrious woman. She is not married and lives with her parents. 

Shirinmoh is a student in the second phase of her course. She studies well and her parents are proud of her because she is a very clever woman. 

She is asking for a loan of 1,000 USD to pay for university tuition because her parents' income from growing crops is only small. This loan will help her to pay for her tuition and in this way to get knowledge. 

She awaits your mercy and  thanks you in advance for your generosity.

loans.use: To pay for university tuition

loans.name: Las Cumplidas Group

texts.es:
Yesica es una joven mujer de 18 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es la venta de refrescos típicos.
Ella es emprendedora, trabajadora, responsable, constante, soñadora y muy optimista. Su trabajo lo realiza en su domicilio ubicado en la zona sur de su ciudad, un lugar caracterizado por el crecimiento constante del comercio en todas las áreas, de clima cálido con una temperatura constante de aproximadamente 30 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Yesica es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el español y habla Quechua por herencia familiar. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que se dedican al comercio en el mercado, y viven en una casa de madera que cuenta con agua y electricidad. Su deseos de mejorar su emprendimiento la llevó a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de tomates, taller de costura, tejidos, venta de pescado, servicio de construcción y elaboración de colchones, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de refrescos típicos del lugar, como; chicha, somó, tamarindo, guayaba, achachairú, limonada y jugo de lima, refrescos de melao o melasa, de miel o el caldo de caña, entre otros. Para la chicha de maíz los ingredientes son: 1 kilo de harina de maíz tostada, 1 lata grande de agua, 2 palos de canela grandes. Ella lo prepara de la siguiente manera; Pone la lata con agua al fuego; cuando hierve, agrega la harina de maíz disuelta en agua fría y los palos de canela, luego lo bate hasta que vuelva a hervir, más o menos dos horas. Lo quía del fuego y deja enfriar; una vez fría, cuela la chicha y agrega azúcar. Esta es la segunda secuencia de préstamos con la institución en cinco años que lleva con esta actividad. Su sueño es tener un snack grande donde pueda ofrecer variedad de comidas y refrescos tradicionales. Ella desea realizar una inversión en la apertura de un snack para servir comida como masaco que es una masa de yuca con charque (carne deshidratada con sal) y se puede comer frio o caliente.
Es por esos motivos que Yesica solicita un préstamo para la apertura de un snack dónde pueda servir comida y refrescos típicos.
texts.en:
Yesica is an 18 year old young woman. She is single, doesn't have any children, and makes a living selling traditional soft drinks. She is enterprising, hardworking, responsible, dependable, idealistic and very optimistic. She makes her living in her home, located in the southern part of her city. It is an area which is characterised by constant commercial growth in all sectors, and by a warm climate, with a constant temperature of 30 degrees Celsius all year round.  

Yesica has long, black hair, a brown complexion and is of medium height. Her mother tongue is Spanish and she speaks Quechua, due to the background of her family. She shares her life with her parents, who make a living selling products in the market. They live in a wooden house, which has running water and electricity.  

Her desire to improve her situation led her to form a communal bank, made up of people with businesses such as: selling tomatoes, a sewing workshop, textiles, selling fish, construction services, and mattress manufacturing. They resolved to ask for a loan to improve their businesses.  

Yesica's business sells traditional soft drinks, which are typical of the area, such as: chicha, somó, tamarind, guava, achachairú, lemonade, lime juice, and drinks made from melao or melasa, honey, caña broth, among others. 

The ingredients to make maize chicha are: 1 kilogram of toasted maize flour, 1 large pan of water and two large cinnamon sticks. Yesica prepares it in the following way: put the pan of water on the hob; when it boils, add the maize flour (mixed with cold water) and the cinnamon sticks. Then stir well and bring to boil for more or less two hours. Take it off the hob and allow it to cool. Once cold, strain the chicha and add sugar. 

This is the second loan cycle in 5 years with Kiva for Yesica. Her dream is to have a large snack bar to sell food, such as masaco, which is a snack made from yuca (cassava) and charqué (a salted meat) and which can be eaten hot or cold. It is for these reasons that Yesica is asking for a loan with which she can open a snack bar, selling food and traditional soft drinks.

loans.use: to open a snack bar, serving food and traditional soft drinks.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina es una mujer divorciada que tiene que cuidar a 3 hijos, ella vive en El Alto  en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a sus familiares. Pero el domicilio esta en buen estado y la familia vive comodamente Marina se dedica a la venta de cortinas para domicilios Marina quiere un prestamo para comprar mayor cantidad de cortinas para poder vender en temporada navideña y con eso incrementar sus ingresos Marina es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar pero goza de buena salud y su emprendimiento tiene muchas posibilidades buenas
texts.en: Marina is a divorced woman who has to take care of three children. She lives in El Alto in a brick and cement house that belongs to her family. The house is in a good state and the family lives comfortably. Marina is dedicated to selling curtains for houses. Marina wants a loan to buy a greater quantity of curtains so she can sell them during the Christmas season and thus increase her income. Marina is the only source of income in her home but she enjoys good health and her enterprise has a lot of good possibilities.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of curtains for her business.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es: Maria de 57 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante en los gastos del hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, el baño y una pila,  pero no tiene de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de ladrillo, laminas, hierro, cemento, arena, polines y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en: Maria is 57 years old. She is a single mother who lives in her own house with her daughter and grandson. She makes a living by selling clothes at markets and what she earns from this enables her to cover her household expenses. She wants to improve her house by building, in the place shown in the photo, a bathroom that would contain a bath and a sink. However, she does not have enough capital to achieve this and for this reason she is asking for a loan to purchase bricks, metal sheets, iron, cement, sand, beams and to pay workers so that her family can live a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, metal sheets, iron, cement, sand, beams and to pay workers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a roof on her house.

loans.name: Doris Aida

texts.es:
Doris de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta 9º grado. Su esposo es empleado y su hijo asiste a parvularia.  

Ella tiene una tienda junto a su madre desde el 2006, decidieron poner la tienda ya que lo vieron como un empleo a un estando en casa y generar mejores ingresos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar gas, ropa y zapatos. Por época navideña ella sabe que tendrá aun mas ingresos y mejorara su calidad de vida a nivel personal y familiar.

A ella le gustaría que su hijo estudiara para doctor, aunque también respeta la decisión que él tome cuando sea grande.
texts.en:
Doris is 26 years old. She went to school up to the 9th grade. Her husband is an employee and her son is in preschool. She has had a store with her mother since 2006. They decided to open it since they saw it was a job someone could have while staying at home and generating income.

The loan he is asking for is to buy gas, clothing and shoes. For the Christmas season she knows she will have more income and will improve her and her family's quality of life.

She would like for her son to go to school to become a doctor, although also respects the decision he will make when he is grown.

loans.use: to buy gas, clothing and shoes. For the Christmas season she knows she will have more income and improve her personal and family quality of life.

loans.name: Dúo San Antonio Group

texts.es:
DUO SAN ANTONIO
Este dúo formado por María Piedad, de 26 años de edad, es soltera, y es la líder de este dúo,  se dedica a la venta y siembra de flores, como yerbera, claveles, etc. Desde hace 2 años.  Ahora quiere sembrar lirios y azucenas pero no cuenta con el suficiente capital para  comprar la semilla que se lo traen por millar. Actualmente cuenta con varias galeras para su siembra pero también quiere seguir creciendo, y espera el apoyo de fape para poder crecer. También esta doña Clara Luz, de 36 años de edad,
texts.en:
SAN ANTONIO DUO

This duo includes María Piedad. She is 26 years old, single and the leader of the duo. She has worked growing and selling flowers for 2 years, such as carnations and gerbera daisies, etc. Now she wants to grow lilies but she doesn't have enough capital to buy seeds which are sold by the thousands. Right now she has several covered areas to grow but she wants to keep expanding, She hopes that with the help of Fape she can grow. The duo also includes Clara Luz, 36 years old.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow flowers

loans.name: Giovana

texts.es: Giovana es una mujer soltera y sin hijos que vive con sus padres en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento  que le pertenece a su familia Giovana se dedica a la venta de frutas, verduras y cereales Giovana corre el riesgo de sufrir un accidente en la carreteras debido a la forma serpenteante del camino y al estado de los caminos  pero aún así, ella sigue adelante y solicita un prestamo para incrementar su mercaderia de frutas y verduras  para poder ganar mayores ingresos con las fiestas de fin de año Giovana es una mujer decidida y goza de buena salud, por lo que espera que puedan ayudarla
texts.en: Giovana is a single woman without children who lives with her parents in El Alto in a brick and cement house that belongs to her family. Giovana works selling fruits, vegetables, and grains. Giovana runs the risk of getting in an accident on the highways due to the serpentine roads and their condition, but even so, she continues onward and asks for a loan to increase her merchandise of fruits and vegetables to be ale to earn more income with the end of year festivities. Giovana is a determined woman and enjoys good health, so she hopes that you can help her.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: José Fabián

texts.es:
José de 59 años de edad, es un hombre que es muy trabajador, solo estudio hasta tercer grado ya que en la escuela que  asistía era el único grado que había, también por la situación económica. 
Es casado su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar son padres de cuatro hijos los cuales ya tiene su respectiva familia, solamente tiene a cargo dos nietos.
José se dedica a la agricultura desde hace más de 20 años,  también  a la crianza de  ganado criollo, trabaja todos los días recorre una distancia de unos dos kilómetros diarios.
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar una ternera, ya que ese es su trabajo con lo cual él pretende generar mayores ingresos para él y su familia.
 Con respecto a sus sueños él quiere que sus nietos estudien, ya que él no tuvo una oportunidad para poder hacerlos; por lo que el crédito le impulsara a generar buenos ingresos para poder ampliar aún más sus actividades productivas
texts.en:
José is 59 years old and is a very hard-working man. He only studied up until the third grade, as it was the only grade in the school he went to, and also because of his economic situation.
 
He is married and his wife looks after the household chores. They have four children, who all have their respective families. He only has two grandchildren to take care of.

José has worked in agriculture for more than 20 years, and also works rearing native cattle. He works every day and travels around two kilometres a day to work.

The loan he is applying for is to buy a calf, as rearing cattle is the work from which he hopes to generate more income for himself and his family.

His dream is for his grandchildren to study, as he did not have the opportunity to do this, so the loan will motivate him to generate good earnings and increase his productivity.

loans.use: to buy a calf, as rearing cattle is the work from which he hopes to generate more income for himself and his family.

loans.name: Ana Emilia

texts.es:
Ana de 46 años de edad, estudio hasta el 5º grado, es madre de 4 hijos, dos estudian y los otros dos trabajan, su esposo se dedica  a trabajar la agricultura.

Ana se dedica a trabajar junto a su esposo en la agricultura, esta actividad la realiza en época de invierno,  tiene que madrugar ya que tiene que preparar los alimentos y prepararse para dirigirse a trabajar, cultiva ya que tiene que ahorrarse los gastos en la producción de maíz esto lo está haciendo para ayudar a su familia, uno de sus hijos les ayuda al trabajo, en época de verano se dedican a trabajar cortando caña siempre para apoyar a su familia.
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar abonos para el cultivo de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz

Espera a futuro seguir trabajando y ayudando a su familia, que sus hijos puedan estudiar y tenga un mejor trabajo y futuro y quiere mejorar su vivienda, ya que está creciendo y quiere que vivan seguros.
texts.en:
Ana, 46 years old, went to school up to 5th grade. She is mother to 4 children, two are students and the other two work. Her husband works in agriculture.

Ana works with her husband in agriculture.  In the winter, the work she does is getting up very early since she has to prepare the food and get ready to go to work and grow the corn since she has to save the costs of corn production. She is doing this to help her family. One of her children helps them in the work. In the summer, they work cutting sugar cane, always to support their family. The loan she is requesting is to buy manure to cultivate 7,000 square meters of corn.

In the future, she hopes to continue working and helping her family, so her children can go to school and have a better job and future and she wants to improve her house since they are growing and she wants them to live securely.

loans.use: to purchase manure for the cultivation of 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.pt:
O senhor Alberto  é batinanador numa empresa de caminhos de ferro, pai casado de 5 filhos dos quais 4 já maiores apenas um a estudar, vive na casa própria.
Ele diz que com este valor irá comprar chapas de zinco e cimento, tijoleira, blocos para sua obra construcao de uma cozinha.
No futuro tem como planos terminar a construcao da cozinha e fazer o muro de vedaçāo do seu quintal a.
Diz que ira pagar conforme o calendario e solicitar mais emprestimos como forma de concretizar os seus planos.
texts.en: Alberto works for a railroad company. He is a married father of 5 children, 4 of whom are already grown up and 1 more is still studying. He lives in his own home. He says that he will use this loan to buy zinc sheeting, cement, floor tiles and blocks for his kitchen, which is under construction. In the future he plans to finish building his kitchen and to erect a boundary wall around his back garden. He says that he will comply with his loan repayment schedule and will apply for further loans in order to fulfil his plans.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting, cement, floor tiles and blocks

loans.name: Elvis

texts.es: Elvis es soltero y no tiene hijos Elvis vive en Achacahi en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler, Elvis vive con relativa comodidad y se gana la vida como ayudante de albañil El cliente quiere un crédito para comprar herramientas de trabajo Elvis es independiente por lo que no tiene a nadie que le ayude por lo que espera su colaboración, además el cliente goza de buena salud.
texts.en: Elvis is single and has no children. He lives in Achacahi in a brick and cement house where he pays rent. Elvis lives in relative comfort and makes his living as an assistant bricklayer. He needs a loan to buy tools for his work. Elvis is independent so he has no one to help him so he hopes for your help. Her is in good health.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: El Sol Group

texts.es:
Guillermina es una mujer de 63 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es la venta ambulante de empanadas y refrescos.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, luchadora, constante, activa, responsable y trabajadora. Su vida la realiza sola y vive en una casa propia de ladrillo que cuenta con agua y electricidad. Su deseo por mejorar su calidad de vida la llevó a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; artesanía en yeso, venta de refrescos, venta de ropa, venta de fruta, venta de tomates, librería y venta de productos cosméticos, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades comerciales.
Guillermina es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el Quechua y habla español por el comercio (en la foto sentada). Su negocio es la venta de empanadas; que son una fina masa de pan, masa quebrada u hojaldre rellena con una preparación salada o dulce y cocida al horno o frita. El relleno puede incluir carnes rojas o blancas, pescado, verduras o fruta. La masa, generalmente, es de harina de trigo –aunque también usa harina de maíz y otros cereales– y suele llevar alguna grasa, aceite o manteca. Y lo acompaña con refrescos típicos como el mocochinchi (durazno deshidratado, hervido con canela y azúcar), que es muy cotizado en esos días calurosos que sólo se viven en Santa Cruz. Su negocio es ambulante; cargada de su canasta llena de empanadas, con un termo grande en la mano y un paquete de vasos descartable en la otra, con un sol radiante que diariamente sobrepasa los 30 grados centígrados, camina por las calles más populares y transitadas de su ciudad. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene realizando esta actividad. Su sueño es tener un snack de comida al paso, y desea realizar la compra de mesas y sillas para ampliar su negocio y porque a su avanzada edad se le dificulta caminar como antes y necesita un negocio más tranquilo.
Es por esos motivos que Guillermina solicita un préstamo para la compra de mesas y sillas para ampliar su negocio y dejar de vender de forma ambulante.
texts.en:
Guillermina is a 63 year old single woman who has no children. Her business is selling empanadas and fruit drinks in the streets.

She is enterprising, independent, a fighter, consistent, active, responsible and hard-working. She has lived her life alone and lives in her own house made of brick which has water and electricity. Her desire to improve her life led her to form a group of people with businesses like: plaster handicrafts, selling soft drinks, selling clothing, the sales of fruit, selling tomatoes, a bookstore and the sales of cosmetics, to request a loan to improve their commercial activities.

Guillermina is dark skinned, has long black hair and medium stature. Her native tongue is Quechua and she speaks Spanish for her business. (She is seated in the photo). Her business is selling empanadas: which are a fine bread dough in pastry filled with a salty or sweet mixture and baked in the oven or fried. The filling might have red meat, white meat, fish, vegetables or fruit. The pastry is generally made of wheat flour, although she also uses corn flour and other grains and has some lard, oil or butter in it. They are accompanied by typical fruit drinks like mocochinchi (dried peach boiled with cinnamon and sugar), which is very sought after on these hot days that you only get in Santa Cruz. She does her business walking with her basket filled with empanadas and a large thermos in her hand and a packet of plastic cups in the other. This under a burning sun that gets above 30 degrees each day. She walks along the most popular and busiest streets of her city.

This is her first loan with the institute that she has had in the 5 years that she has done this business. Her dream is to have a snack bar and wants to make the purchase of chairs and tables to expand her business. Her advanced age makes it hard for her to walk like she used to and she needs a quieter business.

For these reasons Guillermina is requesting a loan to buy tables and chairs to expand her business and stop selling walking through the streets.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs to expand her business and stop having to sell in an itinerant manner.

loans.name: Jhonny Misael

texts.es:
Jhonny de 23 años de edad, estudio hasta un bachillerato, luego ya no pudo seguir estudiando ya que tenía que ayudar a su madre en los trabajos de la agricultura.
Su padre le enseño a trabajar la agricultura en la siembra de granos básicos maíz y frijoles, así mismo trabaja como carpintero ya que también le enseño esta actividad por las tardes a noches se dedica a trabajar en algunos proyectos que tiene en su casa de las personas que le encargan estos trabajos, también se dedica a trabajar con estructuras metálicas. Tiene que madrugar para poder llegar temprano ya que el lugar donde trabaja está a 30 kilómetros de su casa, tiene que abordar un bus que lo conduce al lugar en ocasiones sale bastante tarde y se ve obligado a buscar otro medio de transporte más riesgoso.
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar una motocicleta que será utilizada para transportarse a su lugar de trabajo. 
Desea trabajar fuerte  y en un futuro comprar una casa propia donde pueda formar su propio familia.
texts.en:
Jhonny, age 23, has a high school education.  He was not able to continue on with his education because he had to help his mother with the agricultural work.  His father taught him how to work growing basic grains, corn, and beans.  

In addition, he works as a carpenter because he was also taught this business activity in the afternoons and evenings.  He works on some projects that he has at his house for people who order these jobs.  He also works with metal structures.

He has to get up early in order to be able to get to his work place, which is 30 kilometers from his house.  He has to get on a bus that takes him to his work place.  At times it leaves pretty late, and then he has to look for another means of transportation that is riskier.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy a motorcycle, which he will use to get to his place of work.  He wishes to work hard and buy his own house, where he will be able to have his own family, in the future.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is married and has three children who attend school. She operates a grocery store, which she has been doing for one year. She sells household consumables such as wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of customers taking too long to repay for goods taken on credit. Transportation is another challenge for Mwanasha.

Mwanasha requested a loan from Yehu for 20,000 KES, which she will use to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine lives in Kapan city of the Syunik region. She is a mother of three children; her elder son and daughter are married and her younger son is passing his military service at the army. 

Narine now works as a cleaner at the private company and her husband is a taxi driver. They work very hard since they help their elder son’s family that has some financial problems now. They take care of their three grandchildren, who temporally live with Narine and her husband. As Narine says, needs are numerous but their family financial resources are limited, so they can cover only their first needs.

Narine asks this loan in an amount of 400,000 Armenian drams in order to buy furniture for their living room. They cannot manage repairing of their house, but still the desire to provide their grandchildren with comfort is great, so the furniture can make the room nicer and more attractive than it is now.

loans.use: to buy furniture for their living room.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es: Carmela vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos, ella y su familia viven en la comunidad de Asunción de Caluyo en una casa de adobe que es de su propiedad, la vivienda cuenta con luz y agua Carmela es agricultora y quiere un prestamo para  comprar una vaca con el fin de incrementar su ganado, el marido de Carmela la apoya con su empleo como transportista pero Carmela necesita colaboracion extra, ademas, ella goza de buena salud y su evaluacion de credito es buena
texts.en: Carmela lives in a common law marriage and has two children. She and her family live in the community Asunción de Caluyo in her own house made of adobe [sun-dried brick] with electricity and running water. Carmela is a farmer and wants a loan to purchase a cow in order to increase her cattle. Carmela’s husband supports her with his job as a transportation worker, but Carmela needs extra financial contributions. In addition, she is in good health and her credit rating is good.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Jeans Eduardo

texts.es:
Jeans es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene 22 años y vive en Pueblo Nuevo junto a su familia.
Actualmente está estudiando una carrera porque quiere convertirse en un gran profesional y también está trabajando en una vidriería haciendo todo tipo de trabajos como confección de cuadros, espejos, etc. Es un joven muy trabajador y quiere brindarle todo lo mejor a su familia por eso se esfuerza mucho. En sus tiempos libres le gusta ir a jugar fútbol con sus amigos para poder relajarse un poco.
Jeans quiere empezar su propio negocio de vidriería y tiene mucha experiencia gracias a su trabajo. es por ello que piensa utilizar el crédito para poder comprar vidrio y así elaborar los pedidos que tiene por parte de algunos clientes, con esto ganará un dinero extra y así continuará apoyando a toda su familia. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, más adelante espera tener su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Jeans is a young man with a great desire to get ahead. He is 22 years old and lives in Pueblo Nuevo with his family.

His currently studying for his degree because he would like to become a great professional. He is also working in a glassworks factory doing all kinds of jobs such as manufacturing panes and mirrors, etc. He is a hard-working young man who wants to provide all the best for his family so he tries hard. In his free time he likes to play soccer with his friends to relax a little. 

Jeans wants to start his own glassworks business and he has ample experience due to his job. He plans to use the loan for this, to buy glass and produce the orders he has from some customers. Doing this, he will make some extra money and continue supporting his whole family. He is very appreciative of the Kiva investors for their generosity. Later on he hopes to have his own business.

loans.use: to buy glass for his work.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is married to Michael and together they have been blessed with three children of 27, 23 and 25 years.

Elizabeth is a livestock farmer, a business she has done for the last three years, earning a monthly income of KES 40,000.

Elizabeth has requested her first loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 20,000, which she will use to buy water pipes for watering her farm.

With the anticipated profits, Elizabeth will be able to improve her farming business.

Her hope for the future is to establish her business as a farmer.

loans.use: to buy water pipes.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Rose, who is 30 years of age and a very hardworking and self-driven farmer based in Kiptumo, a remote village in Nandihills. This region has harsh weather patterns, and poultry farming is the only profitable business venture. Rose is happily married and blessed with two children. For the past seven years, she has been involved in mixed farming, and her primary source of income has been selling milk and crop farming. 

She passionately loves poultry farming. When asked what is most enjoyable about farming, her reply was “selling eggs.” Her biggest challenge is the lack of funds to increase her poultry farming. She is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. 

Poultry farming is the only business that thrives in the Nandihills area because of the harsh weather patterns, so she wants to take full advantage of the poultry business. Rose is a member of Arise and Shine Self-Help Group, and through the group, she has received training on financial management and saving. 

Through the loan, she will sell eggs to the local market and to her neighbors, hence improving her living conditions and getting out of the poverty situation she is in currently. Profits from the loan will be used in repaying the loan and increasing her business.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry

loans.name: Tigran

texts.en:
Tigran and his big family live in Kapan city of Syunik region. He is married and he has two sons and a daughter; all of them are school-aged. 

Tigran for many years used to work at the Kapan city’s combine, but now he is busy with agriculture and poultry. He also has a small greenhouse where he cultivates a great range of greens. The harvest of persimmon that he sells from his orchard is so sweet and nice that he does not look for customers to buy it; the re-sellers buy it right from his house. With the help of his wife, he sells also a lot of eggs and chicken meat from his farm.

Tigran will be happy to receive this loan since he needs to buy seeds for greens and also fodder for his chickens.

loans.use: to buy seeds for greens and also fodder for his chickens.

loans.name: San Cayetano 2 Group

texts.es:
El comité está conformado por 17 señoras que apuntan a una mejor y buena calidad de vida, es por eso que se están esforzando para poder mejorar sus vidas y las de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lilian, quien es madre soltera, ella es tejedora y vendedora ambulante y también tiene una huerta, de más o menos 8 parcelas y cuenta con un pequeño gallinero con 12 aves con lo cual le provee de huevos con los cuales los vende. Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder seguir con sus tejidos, como hilos y agujas, además de comprar insumos para su huerta.
texts.en: This group is made up of 17 women who aim for a better quality of living, so they are making an effort to improve their lives and those of their families. One of the members is Lilian who is a single mother. She is a weaver and itinerant vendor and she also has an orchard of about 8 plots and has a small chicken coop with 12 chickens who provide her with eggs that she sells. She is a hard-working person and a fighter. She is requesting this loan to buy materials to continue with her weaving like thread and needles and also to buy supplies for her orchard.

loans.use: to buy materials to continue with her weaving like thread and needles and to buy supplies for her orchard.

loans.name: Latofat

texts.en:
Latofat lives in the J.Rumi district. She is a divorced woman at the age of 50 who lives with her two sons, her daughter-in-law and her grandson. Latofat is a housewife. She has no higher education, and until now did not work. 

But now she intends to start her own business. She is interested in buying and selling children's clothing. She thinks it's a profitable business. Latofat will be engaged in this activity in the local market. 

However, to start a business she has difficulty with finances. Therefore, Latofat applied for a loan to purchase children's clothing. She really needs this loan. She wants to start a new business and feel herself an independent woman.

loans.use: To purchase children's clothing to start a new business.

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot impatiently waits for his third deal with Kiva, since his previous two were so helpful and great for him. Ashot lives in the village of Siznak in the Syunik region. He is married and he has two daughters. The elder daughter is a student and the smallest is still school-aged.  

Ashot and his wife are employed as laborers at a dairy farm. They also have their own cute farm, where Ashot is already skilled in swine breeding and poultry. Ashot also grows fruit and vegetables on his plot of land. He sells his farm's products — vegetables, fruit, pork and eggs — to his regular customers in the city of Kapan. 

This time the aim of Ashot’s Kiva deal is the need of the purchase of fodder, which he wants to buy both for his pigs and chickens, since with coming of winter it is the most urgent problem that each farmer tries to solve.

loans.use: to buy fodder both for his pigs and chickens

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.en:
Zuhro lives with her family in a rural area where the weather is too cold in the winter season. She was born in 1971 in Tajikistan. Zuhro is married and has three children. Her husband is a rental worker. She is also a very hardworking woman and always helps her husband to improve the living condition for her children. 

Zuhro works in a café as a waitress. She has worked there more than 10 years. Zuhro and her husband work hard from early morning till late evening, but their income is not enough to provide the family with all its needs. She must buy wood and coal to keep a warm house in the winter season but she doesn't have the money. 

Zuhro is asking for a loan of 2,500 Somoni to buy wood and coal. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy wood and coal for the winter season

loans.name: Jose Eulofio

texts.es: Jose de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de las ventas de sus cultivos logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda terminando de construir un cuarto, pero no tiene de suficiente capital por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de ladrillos, laminas, cemento, polines, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Jose is 52 years old and lives in his own house with his family. He has worked in agriculture for several years. With what he makes from selling his crops he manages to settle some of the household expenses. 

He wants to improve his home by finishing the construction of a room, but he does not have enough capital. Therefore he is requesting a loan to buy bricks, metal sheeting, cement, beams, sand and metal, and pay for labor costs so his family can live more comfortably and safely.

loans.use: to buy bricks, metal sheeting, cement, beams, sand and metal, and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Irma Esthela

texts.es:
Irma de 43 años de edad, no estudio ningún grado académico, es madre de 3 hijos; uno está estudiando 8º grado y los dos mayores no estudian, se dedican a trabajar con su padre en la agricultura.
Irma se ha dedicado a trabajar en la venta de peces desde que estaba muy pequeña en compañía de su madre, ya que en la zona los capturan en la laguna; luego se dirige a  venderlos en las comunidades más cercanas o donde tenga una buen negocio, pero antes tiene que ayudarle a una señora a hacer tortillas por la mañana y por la tarde se dirige a vender hasta que lo termina o cuando se oscurece, su compañero de vida se dedica a la agricultura y a la pesca quien le ayuda en los gastos familiares.
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar una cocina  a gas, ya que quiere poner su propio negocio de venta de tortillas e invertir en el negocio de compra y venta de pescado.
Desea trabajar y sacar a su último hijo adelante en los estudios, ya que sus hijos mayores no lo han podido hacer.
texts.en:
Irma, 43, did not attend school.  She's the mother of three children, one in eighth grade.  The two older ones don't attend school; they work with their father in agriculture.

Irma has earned a living selling fish with her mother since she was very young.  They fish in the lagoon in the area, then she sells the fish in the closest communities or where she does a good business.  First, though, she has to help a woman make tortillas in the morning.  In the afternoon, she makes sales until she runs out or until it gets dark.  Her life partner works in agriculture and in fishing, which helps her with the family expenses.

The loan she's requesting is to buy a gas stove.  She wants to start her own business selling tortillas and invest in her business buying and selling fish.

Irma wants to work and get her youngest child ahead in school because her older children haven't been able to do so.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove so she can start her own business making tortillas, and to invest in her business buying and selling fish

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
El comité está conformado por 21 señoras que apuntan a una mejor y buena calidad de vida, no solo para ellas, sino también para sus familias. Son personas muy sacrificadas y luchadoras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Delia, madre de 1 hijo, aun pequeño, está casada, ella ejerce la Docencia y también es Macatera (venta de platería y ropas en general de manera ambulante),  es muy activa en su comité y gracias a las capacitaciones que está recibiendo ha ido mejorando.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de platería variada para poder venderla y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradecen todas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder crecer en sus emprendimientos.
texts.en:
This communal bank is made up of 21 women who aim for a better quality of life, not just for themselves, but for their families as well. They are very selfless and determined people. One of the members is Delia, who is the mother of one young son and is married. She teaches and is also is a street vendor, walking up and down the street to sell silver jewelry and clothes. She is very active in her communal bank; thanks to the training that she is receiving, she has been steadily improving.

She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of various pieces of silver jewelry to sell in order to continue with her sales like she has been doing. She expresses gratitude to everyone for the opportunity that she is receiving to grow in her endeavors.

loans.use: Comprar platería variadas para la venta.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients such as wheat flour, butter, eggs, etc., and purchase some clothes for her online shop

loans.name: Juana Deysi

texts.es: Juana de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 25 años, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal y posee muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la calidad de los productos, Juana esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más frutas y verduras por mayor para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Juana, 39, lives in her own home with her four children and her husband.

She has earned a living selling fruits and vegetables for 25 years.  Her business is located in the town market and she has a lot of customers because of her good prices and quality products.

Juana's requesting a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale so she can earn more income.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Winny

texts.en:
Winny is a 46-year-old energetic, hardworking mother of 6 children. She is from the Nandihills area of Kenya, which is an area referred to as the tea region because half the tea that Kenya exports comes from this region.

Winny is very hardworking and she always says, “My parents taught me to work hard from a very young age, and now I am independent.” Winny is very dedicated, and she does mixed farming and some small business to supplement her income. Winny makes sure that she gives the best to her 6 children so that they can be productive in the future and support themselves. Winny enjoys farming, especially milking and grazing her dairy cows.

Winny has farmed for 15 years and is recognized as one of the best farmers in her village. Because of this, most villagers want products from her farm. This has increased her profits. Although she enjoys selling her products to the nearby market and to neighbors, her income is not sufficient to enable her to comfortably take care of her family. Therefore, she plans to start a poultry farm.

Winny is requesting 65,000 KES to start a poultry farm to improve her income. The Nandihills area is a populated area. There is a market for eggs and poultry products, but the supply is low. Winny plans to take advantage of that and reap more profits. Winny has been trained by Juhudi Kilimo and is financially disciplined. She believes that she will be able to repay the loan and open other business ventures. If you are a mother from Africa, getting your hands on financial services is difficult, but Winny is sure that through your kindness, she will be able to acquire the loan, help her family, and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy poultry to start a poultry farm.

loans.name: Roza

texts.en:
Roza is a widow, and she is 55 years old. Her only daughter is married and lives separately. Roza lives with her mother in Pyandj district of Tajikistan. She is a dressmaker and  she has been engaged for three years in this business. Roza buys fabric, sews  women's dresses and then brings them to market for sale. Besides this activity she is also engaged in farming. 

The purpose of this loan is to buy a new Yamata sewing machine  to develop her sewing business. Roza awaits your support.

loans.use: To purchase a new Yamata sewing machine

loans.name: Manuel Ernesto

texts.es: Manuel de 60 años de edad se dedica desde hace 19 años a la agricultura siembra hortalizas (tomate, chile, cebolla)  comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa y su hija en casa propia, Manuel está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel, 60, has earned a living in agriculture for 19 years.  He grows vegetables (tomatoes, chili peppers, onions) and sells his crops in the various markets near his house.  He lives in his own home with his wife and his daughter.

Manuel's requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, soil amendments, pest control, and so on, and to improve his land, shown in the photograph.  That way he'll be able to continue with his job and earn more income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, soil amendments, pest control, etc., and to improve his land

loans.name: Nagina

texts.en:
Nagina is a 24-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of two children. Her husband has been running his own auto workshop for many years; he is the only person responsible to fulfill the needs of his entire family. 

Nagina's husband wants to purchase different kinds of tools and other accessories for his business purposes. But due to financial constraints he is not in a suitable position to buy all of these products for his workshop. 

Therefore Nagina has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all these accessories and will also help him to earn maximum profitable income to manage his household and business. 

Nagina is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy tools and other accessories for her husband's auto workshop business.

loans.name: Zehra

texts.en:
Zehra has a daughter, and she is divorced from her husband. She works as a cleaner in the social security office. Her daughter is a student, and Zehra herself also attends medical secretary courses to be able to work a desk job in the future. However, her minimum wage causes her to struggle with daily and educational expenses. So she sells underwear, sleepwear and socks to support these expenses. If she can get her loan, she will purchase new products to resell. 

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Zehra Hanım,bir çocuklu.  Eşinden ayrılmış.  Sosyal Güvenlik Kurumunda hizmetli olarak çalışmakta.  Kızını okutuyor.  Kendisi de dışarıdan okuyor,tıbbi sekreterlik kurslarına gidiyor.  İleride,masabaşı çalışabilmek için gayret gösteriyor.  Hem kızının eğitimi hem kendisinin eğitimi ve geçim koşullarının ağırlığı belini büküyor.  Askari ücretle çalışıyor.  Giderlerini karşılamak için,çorap,çamaşır,pijama vs satışı yapıyor.  Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile malzeme alacak.  Hayatını kolaylaştırmak ve güzelleştirmek için çaba harcıyor.

loans.use: to buy products

loans.name: Majed 8 Group

texts.en:
Montaha is the featured borrower for Majed 8 Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living conditions at the same time.

Montaha is a 55-year-old married mother of two children who has been baking and preparing "Mouneh" from her house for twenty years to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family.

Today, Montaha is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to expand her business through buying necessary baking materials to satisfy her customers with a better service.

With respect to her group members, Chadia is the first one on the right, Hanaa is the first one on the left of the photo, and Montaha is the lady sitting in the middle.

loans.use: to buy necessary baking materials

loans.name: Ishrat

texts.en:
Ishrat is a 34-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two sons. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days his rickshaw has not been working properly, because of which he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. 

Therefore, Ishrat has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Ishrat is so much thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to cover the expense of her husband's rickshaw repair.

loans.name: José Mercedes

texts.es:
José de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta un noveno grados,  sus dos hijos están pequeños no asisten a la escuela, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

José se dedica a trabajar como vigilante de una empresa privada trabaja 5 días a la semana por las noches, entra a las 5 de la tarde y sale a las 6 de la mañana; luego retorna a su casa esto lo ha hecho desde hace 6 años a veces lo cambian para el dio, su compañera de vida se dedica a elaborar tortillas para ayudar en los gastos familiares. 
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar láminas, tejas, madera, clavos para reparar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra dañado. 

Desea seguir trabajando y mantener a su compañera de vida y además quiere a un futuro mejorar su vivienda y sus hijos.
texts.en:
José, who is 39 years old, went to school through ninth grade. His two children are small and don't attend school. His wife does the domestic tasks.

José works as a watchman at a private business. He works five days a week during the night. He begins at 5 in the afternoon and leaves at 6 in the morning. Then he returns to his house. He has done this for six years. Sometimes they change him to the day shift. His life companion makes tortillas to help with the family expenses.

The loan that he is applying for is to buy metal sheeting, tiles, wood, and nails to repair the roof of his house, which is damaged.

He wants to continue working and support his life companion and their children, and in the future he also wants to improve his house.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, tiles, wood, and nails to repair the roof of his house, which is damaged.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Don Santos de 44 años de edad se dedica desde hace 15 años a la crianza de cerdos, comercializa los cerdos en los pueblos aledaños, con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, Don Santos vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar concentrado para los cerdos y asi poder continuar con la crianza de los mismo y tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Don Santos, who is 44 years old, has worked for 15 years raising pigs. He sells the pigs in the neighboring towns. With the sales that he makes, he manages to get ahead with the household expenses. Don Santos lives in his own house with his wife and his son. He is applying for a loan so that he can buy concentrated feed for the pigs and thus be able to continue raising them and have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for pigs.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es: Felipa  es soltera  pero tiene 3 hijos, ella y su familia viven en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su familia Felipa es vendedora de frutas y ocupa un puesto en un mercado Felipa quiere un credito para comprar mayor cantidad de fruta, de esa manera podra incrementar sus ingresos debido a la alta demanda en fiestas de fin de año Felipa es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar
texts.en: Felipa is single but she has three children. She and her family live in El Alto in a house of brick and cement that belongs to her family. Felipa is a seller of fruit and occupies a stall in a market. Felipa wants a loan in order to buy a greater quantity of fruit. In this way, she will be able to increase her income due to the high demand during the celebrations at the end of the year. Felipa is the only source of income in her household.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fruit

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity but no piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past one year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of those taking too long to repay for goods taken on credit. 

With the loan 50,000 Kenyan shillings she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Bobomurot

texts.en:
Bobomurot is 38 years old, married and has four children, and he lives in a small village of the north in Tajikistan.

Bobomurot has always worked in agriculture, growing wheat and potatoes, and he has also worked as a day laborer for hire, but 15 years ago he decided to have his own farm as well to continue growing wheat and potatoes. He sells this harvest in a local market, and that is how he makes an income to provide for the family. 

He is going to buy seeds of wheat for the next sowing season and with this aim, he is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni. His plan is to continue increasing the production to generate more household income.

loans.use: to buy seeds of wheat

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over two years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. With the loan of 30,000 KES,she wants to purchase sugar, rice, flour, oil and utensils for her business. The main reason she joined yehu was to boost her business and thereby improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, flour, oil and utensils for her business

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.en:
Ulugbek was born in 1988. He lives with his family in a rural area. Ulugbek is married but has no children. He is a very industrious man.

Ulugbek has been busy with growing crops for more than five years. Also he raises and sells cows. Ulugbek’s working day usually begins at 5 o’clock in the morning. He works hard to earn a living and his wife helps him with managing their farm business.

 Ulugbek must buy coal to keep  his house warm in the winter season. The weather is very cold in the northern countries in Tajikistan. He is asking for a loan of 1500 Somoni to buy coal. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy wood and coal for the winter season

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah, 44 years old, is married and has four children. Hannah lives in a town near the market and has customers who can find her easily. She is applying for a loan of GHS 2,500 from ID Ghana. She sells cooked rice and stew at a small market area. 

Hannah will use the loan to buy rice, cooking oil, fish and vegetables to prepare rice and stew to sell to customers. She is making good money from selling, and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future.

loans.use: to buy rice, cooking oil, fish and vegetables prepare rice and stew to sell to customers.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is a 31-year-old woman and mother of three children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a food stall where he sells spicy fruit chat and other dishes. He is the only responsible person to feed the entire family and manage the household expenses.

Saima's husband needs to purchase different types of fruits and other ingredients for chat-making purposes so that he can provide delicious and spicy chat to his regular customers,  improve his sales growth, and earn maximum profit. But due to an unfavorable financial position, he is not in a position to purchase these items for his business purposes.

Therefore Saima has applied for a Kiva loan from field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for business purposes. 

She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy different kinds of ingrediants for her husband's spicy chat-selling business.

loans.name: Rozeena

texts.en:
Rozeena is a 40-year-old woman and mother of four children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is fruit seller by profession; he sells fruits like apples, bananas, and grapes. He is solely responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household.

Rozeena's husband needs to purchase different types of fruit to resell so that he can increase the size of his business, improve his sales growth and earn maximum profit. But due to an unfavorable financial position he is not in the condition to purchase fruits for his business purpose. Therefore, Rozeena has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for the business.

She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy fruits to resell.

loans.name: Shaista

texts.en:
Shaista is a 31-year-old, married woman. She has three children. She, along with her husband, has been running a business of purchasing and selling animals. She looks after the cattle and is responsible for feeding them, while her husband sells them to different markets in the city. Their business is providing them with enough income to support their family. However, she needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures including food, health and clothing. 

In order to expand her earnings, Shaista has availed a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to buy more baby goats to sell to expand the business, and that will help in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy more baby goats to sell, to expand the business to improve her family’s living standards.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university registration fees for his son's law program.

loans.name: Maria Beronica

texts.es: Maria de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa para damas y caballeros por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en: Maria, who is 59 years old, lives in her own house with her family group. She sells clothing as a street vendor in the various markets. She has many regular customers because of the quality of the clothing and the good prices. Maria is applying for a loan to purchase more clothing for women and men wholesale in order to continue with her sales and thus be able to have greater income.

loans.use: to buy more women's and men's clothing wholesale

loans.name: Lira

texts.ru: Лира, 45 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. С 2002 года Лира занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодняшний день Лира смогла развить свою деятельность, у нее есть 2 коровы, 2 нетели, 4 овцы, 8 коз. Есть 2,0 ГА земли, где Лира выращивает кукурузу. Супруг и дети активно и с удовольствием помогают по хозяйству. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет примерно 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса Лира обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для разведения и увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Лира планирует направить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Lira is 45, married, and the mother of five children. She has been raising livestock and planting crops since 2002. She has been able to expand her business and currently has two cows, two calves, four sheep, and eight goats, along with a 2.0 hectare plot of land where she grows corn. Her spouse and children happily and actively help her on the farm. She earns about 7,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to continue expanding her business, Lira applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy calves and increase her livestock headcount. She plans to use the income from the loan to continue to develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves and continue investing in the growth of her business.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en: Rukhsana is 34 years old, and a married woman and mother of five children. The man shown in the photo is Rukhsana’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Rukhsana has availed a Murabaha loan of 20,000 PKR for her husband. He wants to buy new tires with some spare auto  parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers.

loans.use: to buy new tires with some spare auto parts.

loans.name: Sehrish

texts.en:
Sehrish is 42 years old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her three sons are in school. Her husband has been running her own garment business for many years. He is solely responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household. 

Sehrish's husband needs to purchase different types of garments in bulk to resell, but due to insufficient financial means he is unable to purchase these. Therefore, Sehrish is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can assist her husband in purchasing these clothes in bulk for his business. 

Sehrish is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy different kinds of garments for resale.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a woman eager to get ahead. She is 55 years old and lives with her seven children in the Nandihills area of Kenya. Her children are her greatest motivation in life to persevere, because she wants to provide them with a better future. Emily was unable to study to get a professional career because of the economic situation that her family faced. However, she never gave up and she has been practicing farming for the past 20 years. 

Because of how much she likes farming she has even nicknamed one of her cows Birirmet. She is a very proud farmer, especially when she is milking her cows. Through her dairy cow, she is able to get between 10 and 15 liters a day, and this helps her support her family. Emily also practices crop farming, but she has not been making good profits because of poor farming implements. That is why she is kindly seeking a loan to buy farm implements. Through the loan, she will be able to buy high-quality seeds, good fertilizer and pesticides that she will use to greatly improve her crop production. Modern farming requires the use of modern techniques, and therefore using high-quality seeds will assure her of a bumper harvest and hence, increased profit levels. 

Emily is very visionary, and her goal for the season is to boost her crop production and be able to get more crop output than the previous year. All this can be achieved through lenders’ help and goodwill. Emily believes that through the loan, she will turn around her family life and be able to give her children a solid educational background. This loan will be Emily’s way out of poverty.

loans.use: To buy farm implements, high-quality seeds, good fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
HELLO LENDERS! Meet Hellen, a 29-year-old, jovial mother of two lovely children, whom she refers to as her “heartbeat.” Hellen hails from the Nandi Hills area of Kenya, a place that has produced some top elite athletes for the world. Nandi Hills has good weather patterns that favor crop and dairy farming. Hellen is a very hardworking woman who enjoys farming, which she has been doing on her small piece of land for the past 10 years. Through all those years, she has gained much experience and is one of the most respected farmers in her village. Because of the immense knowledge that she has of farming, Hellen offers extension services to other farmers who are new in the business. 

Being a caring and loving mother, Hellen has been able to take care of her family and support them through the profits she has earned from farming. Although Hellen reaps much profit from farming, one challenge that she is facing that is dragging her behind and preventing her from “reaching on top of the skies” is a lack of enough land to farm. For this reason, Hellen is seeking a loan of KES 65,000 to be able to buy a piece of land and expand her farming activities. Having so much experience in farming, Hellen is sure that she will make good use of the land and double her profit levels. 

Through the profits, she would be able to repay the loan and improve her living conditions. Hellen is sure that if you invest in her, she will be able to realize her dream of having a good quality life and securing her children's future. Hellen has gone through the repayment schedule and amount, and is comfortable with the plan. Hellen patiently waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land and expand her farming activities.

loans.name: Naila

texts.en:
Naila is a 24-year-old, married woman. The man shown in the photo is her husband who has been doing a business of cattle sales and purchases for the past ten years. Naila fully supports and assists her husband with his work. They currently have a few goats.  

Now, Naila has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of PKR 20,000, which they used to purchase more goats to sell in the market, to earn good profits and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase more goats to sell in the market, to earn good profits and improve their standard of living.

loans.name: Rifhat

texts.en:
Rifhat is a responsible mother of seven children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for many years. He is responsible to fulfill the needs of entire family. Her husband needs to make maintenance of his taxi because the current condition of it is not good.  It requires more maintenance charges on daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to make maintenance of his taxi. Therefore, Rifhat has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Rifhat's husband can afford the maintenance costs easily, and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Rifhat also plans to make savings with the profits of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future. Rifhat is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance repairs of her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Musrat

texts.en:
Musrat is a 38-year-old married woman and mother of six children. Her husband (also shown in the photo), some time ago, started a van driving business. 

Musrat's husband owns one Suzuki van and needs some financial help. Therefore, Musrat has requested a murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR for her husband. He will use the amount to pay for repair and maintenance costs of the van. Musrat is hopeful that her husband’s business will prosper and their standard of living will improve.

loans.use: to pay for repair and maintenance costs of the van.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth, 52 years old, is married and has children. She sells fresh foodstuff in Accra. Her customers are located all around Accra. This loan is Elizabeth's seventh transaction with ID Ghana. She will use the loan to buy cassava and plantain to sell to her customers at the market. Elizabeth has requested this loan because she needs to serve more customers. Elizabeth faces challenges in her business, such as dealing with competition in the area, since there are several neighborhood foodstuff sellers at the market. She will use her profits to continue buying more foodstuff so that she can increase her capital.

loans.use: To buy cassava and plantain to sell to her customers at the market.

loans.name: Remziye

texts.en:
Remziye has a child, and her husband went bankrupt. She works as a housekeeper in a cleaning company. She is a tenant in her house, and her minimum wage is not enough to pay for rent and the utility bills. For this reason, she also sells hologram pictures and apparel. Her child will begin primary school next semester, and her mother is taking care of him temporarily. She can only visit him during the weekends. She is struggling to have better living conditions. With her new loan, she is planning to purchase more products to resell and make better sales.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff. 

Remziye Hanım, 1 çocuklu.  Temizlik şirketinde hizmetli.  Eşi iflas etmiş.  Evi kira,askari ücretle çalışıyor.  Zor koşullarda yaşıyor.  Evi geçindirmek,kira vermek,elektrik su vs giderleri aldığı maaşla olmuyor.  Ek iş olarak 3 boyutlu resim ve çamaşır satışı yapıyor.  ocuğu, gelecek dönem okula başlayacak.  Şimdilik annesi bakıyor.  Haftada bir, hafta sonları görebiliyor.  Yaşam koşullarını iyileştirmek için mücadele ediyor.  Bizden aldığı kredi ile toplu mal alıp,daha çok para kazanacak.

loans.use: to buy products to sell

loans.name: Reshman

texts.en: Reshman is a 26-year-old married woman, and the mother of one child who is also shown in the photo. The man shown in the photo is Reshman’s husband who is running business selling tires of various vehicles to meet the family expenses.  For the improvement of her husband’s business, Reshman has availed a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR. It helped her husband in purchasing good quality tires for increasing sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase good quality tires for increasing sales and profits.

loans.name: Saba

texts.en: Saba is a 22-year-old, married woman; she has been running a business of purchasing and selling animals for many years, with the support of her husband who is also shown in the photo. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then her husband sells them near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries). Currently she has availed a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR to purchase more baby goats to grow her business.  She dreams of providing good quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats to grow her business.

loans.name: Maroof

texts.en:
Maroof, age 49, is a divorced woman. She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, raises them, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income.
